mapper.select:
select from m_farmhouse_daily
`name` like trim(replace (#{name,jdbcType=CHAR} '%' ,' ',''))
and daily_time>=#{start}
and #{end}>=daily_time
order by daily_time desc ,`name` asc
mapper.insert:
insert into m_farmhouse_daily
fh_d,
farmhouse_id,
`name`,
daily_time,
`number`,
times,
#{fhD,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{farmhouseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{name,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{dailyTime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{number,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{times,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.update:
update m_farmhouse_daily
farmhouse_id = #{farmhouseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR},
daily_time = #{dailyTime,jdbcType=DATE},
`number` = #{number,jdbcType=BIGINT},
times = #{times,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where fh_d = #{fhD,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update m_farmhouse_daily set farmhouse_id = #{farmhouseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, daily_time = #{dailyTime,jdbcType=DATE}, `number` = #{number,jdbcType=BIGINT}, times = #{times,jdbcType=BIGINT} where fh_d = #{fhD,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into m_farmhouse_daily (dailyFarmHouseID, farmhouse_id, `name`, daily_time, `number`, times) values (#{po.dailyFarmHouseID,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.farmhouseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.name,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.dailyTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{po.number,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.times,jdbcType=BIGINT})
